name: bobygo's Demo
description:
|--| bobygo's Demo |--|

Hello user, this game is a "Demo" of what i can make and how my games will be like in the future. This game will not

be updated, has unfinished systems and has content created by others (the content has been credited). The music in this demo is personal and

commercial use. (I recommend showing the end credits incase the creator wants to be credited)

I hope you have fun!

-bobygo 3/17/2023
